casebody.data:
No. COA17-1213 Court of Appeals of North Carolina. Filed: July 3, 2018

Robert Joseph STEWART, Christine Sylvia Stewart, Lewis S. Sayre, Marcia D. Sayre, Joseph Byington, W.E. West, Elizabeth S. West, Theodore Roosevelt Flagg, Jr., Suporn Flagg, John Mark Dean, Ruth Ann Dean and Philip Scott Dean, Plaintiffs,
v.
STEEL CREEK PROPERTY OWNERS ASSOCIATION, Defendant.

REVERSED. REMANDED IN PART. AFFIRMED IN PART.
